text: Malur Ramasamy Srinivasan (born 5 January 1930),Profile , asset.org.in; accessed 2 June 2015. is an Indian nuclear scientist and mechanical engineer. He played a key role in the development of India's nuclear power programme and the development of the PHWR. He received the Padma Vibhushan Award. He was born in Bangalore, India. ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www.asset.org.in/Archtechts%20of%20Indian%20Nuclear%20Programme.pdf * http://dae.nic.in/?q=node/394 * http://www.asianscientist.com/features/m-r- srinivasan-former-chairman-indian-atomic-energy-comission-nehru-centre/ * http://www.dianuke.org/understand-liability-srinivasan/ * http://www.business- standard.com/article/opinion/m-r-srinivasan-why-kudankulam-nuke-plant-is- viable-111100900019_1.html Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Indian physicists Category:Indian engineers Category:People from Bangalore Category:Nuclear engineers
title: M. R. Srinivasan
